comments:
I have setup the synchronize view to automatically synchronize at startup a bunch of eclipse.org projects in CVS.

Today, I got an error (from error log view):

-- Error Log --
Date: Thu Aug 23 16:22:50 BRT 2007
Message: Unable to create view ID org.eclipse.team.sync.views.SynchronizeView: An unexpected exception was thrown.

It looks like there will have to be used a dual-core (or hyper-threading) machine to reproduce it. Michael, could you help us a little bit with this?

This has been fixed in 3.3.1.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 192735 ***
